title: VSME Digital Template - Form Schema
description: Complete schema for the EFRAG VSME (Voluntary Sustainability Reporting Standard for Medium-sized Entities) digital reporting form. This schema represents all fields that need to be filled for sustainability reporting.

xbrl_information.title: Information on the report necessary for XBRL

entityName.label: Name of the reporting entity
entityName.description: The full legal name of the entity preparing this sustainability report.
entityName.extractionGuidance: Look for: company name, legal entity name, registered name, corporate name

identifierType.label: Identifier type of the reporting entity
identifierType.description: The type of unique identifier used for the entity.
identifierType.extractionGuidance: Look for: LEI number, legal entity identifier, EU company ID, DUNS number, PermID

identifierValue.label: Identifier value
identifierValue.description: The actual identifier value (e.g., LEI number).
identifierValue.extractionGuidance: Look for: the actual ID number corresponding to the identifier type

currency.label: Currency of monetary values in the report
currency.description: The currency in which all monetary values are expressed.
currency.extractionGuidance: Look for: currency mentioned in financial statements, reporting currency

reportingStartDate.label: Reporting period start date
reportingStartDate.description: The start date of the reporting period.
reportingStartDate.extractionGuidance: Look for: fiscal year start, reporting period start, from date

reportingEndDate.label: Reporting period end date
reportingEndDate.description: The end date of the reporting period.
reportingEndDate.extractionGuidance: Look for: fiscal year end, reporting period end, to date

hasPreviousReport.label: Has previous report with unchanged disclosures
hasPreviousReport.description: Whether this report references unchanged disclosures from a previous report.
hasPreviousReport.extractionGuidance: Look for: references to prior year reports, unchanged information

unchangedDisclosures.label: List of unchanged disclosures
options: B2 Practices, policies and future initiatives
B3 Energy and greenhouse gas emissions
B7 Resource use, circular economy and waste
B10 Workforce – Remuneration, collective bargaining and training
B11 Convictions and fines for corruption and bribery
C3 GHG reduction targets and climate transition
C6 Own workforce human rights policies and processes
C7 Severe negative human rights incidents
C8 Revenues from certain sectors and EU benchmark exclusions
C9 Governance body gender diversity ratio
unchangedDisclosures.extractionGuidance: Identify which disclosure sections remain unchanged from previous report

previousReportUrl.label: Link to previous report
previousReportUrl.extractionGuidance: Look for: URL links to prior reports, previous report location

basis_for_preparation.title: B1 Basis for Preparation and other undertaking's general information

basisForPreparation.label: Basis for preparation
basisForPreparation.description: Whether using Basic Module only or Basic + Comprehensive Module.
basisForPreparation.extractionGuidance: Look for: reporting framework, modules used, reporting scope

omittedDisclosures.label: List of omitted disclosures (classified or sensitive)
omittedDisclosures.description: Disclosures omitted due to classified or sensitive information.
omittedDisclosures.extractionGuidance: Look for: omissions, excluded information, sensitive data not disclosed

reportingBasis.label: Basis for reporting
reportingBasis.description: Whether report is consolidated (includes subsidiaries) or individual.
reportingBasis.extractionGuidance: Look for: consolidated accounts, group reporting, individual entity

legalForm.label: Undertaking's legal form
legalForm.extractionGuidance: Look for: legal structure, company type, entity form (Ltd, LLC, GmbH, etc.)

otherLegalForm.label: Other legal form specification
otherLegalForm.description: Specify the legal form if 'other' was selected.
otherLegalForm.extractionGuidance: Specific legal form if not in standard list

naceCodes.label: NACE sector classification code(s)
naceCodes.description: European statistical classification of economic activities codes.
naceCodes.extractionGuidance: Look for: industry sector, business activities, NACE codes, SIC codes

balanceSheetSize.label: Size of balance sheet (€)
balanceSheetSize.description: Total size of the balance sheet in euros.
balanceSheetSize.extractionGuidance: Look for: total assets, balance sheet total

turnover.label: Turnover (€)
turnover.extractionGuidance: Look for: revenue, sales, turnover, total income

employeeCount.label: Number of employees
employeeCount.extractionGuidance: Look for: employee count, workforce size, headcount, FTE

employeeCountingTiming.label: Employee counting methodology (Timing)
employeeCountingTiming.description: When the employee count was measured.
employeeCountingTiming.extractionGuidance: Look for: as of date (end of period) or average during period

employeeCountingType.label: Employee counting methodology (Type)
employeeCountingType.description: Whether using headcount or full-time equivalent.
employeeCountingType.extractionGuidance: Look for: headcount vs FTE specification

primaryCountry.label: Country of primary operations
primaryCountry.description: Country where primary operations and significant assets are located.
primaryCountry.extractionGuidance: Look for: headquarters location, main office, country of operations

subsidiaries.label: Subsidiaries list
subsidiaries.extractionGuidance: Look for: list of subsidiaries, group companies, affiliated entities with addresses

hasSustainabilityCerts.label: Has sustainability certifications
hasSustainabilityCerts.extractionGuidance: Look for: certifications, eco-labels, sustainability awards

sustainabilityCertsDescription.label: Description of certifications
sustainabilityCertsDescription.description: Brief description including issuer, date, and rating score.
sustainabilityCertsDescription.extractionGuidance: Look for: ISO certifications, B Corp, Carbon Neutral, LEED, etc. with details

autoGeolocation.label: Enable automatic geolocation
autoGeolocation.description: Whether to use OpenStreetMap for automatic geolocation.

sites.label: Sites list
sites.extractionGuidance: Look for: office locations, facility addresses, plant locations, site addresses

sustainability_practices.title: B2 – Practices, policies and future initiatives

hasSustainabilityPractices.label: Has sustainability practices/policies
hasSustainabilityPractices.extractionGuidance: Look for: sustainability initiatives, environmental policies, ESG programs

sustainabilityIssuesAddressed.label: Sustainability issues addressed
sustainabilityIssuesAddressed.extractionGuidance: Identify which sustainability topics are covered by practices

cooperativeGovernance.label: Effective participation in governance
cooperativeGovernance.description: Description of worker/stakeholder participation in governance.
cooperativeGovernance.extractionGuidance: For cooperatives: Look for: worker participation, stakeholder governance

cooperativeInvestment.label: Financial investment in social economy entities
cooperativeInvestment.extractionGuidance: For cooperatives: Look for: investments in social enterprises

cooperativeProfitLimits.label: Limits to profit distribution
cooperativeProfitLimits.extractionGuidance: For cooperatives: Look for: profit distribution limits, mutualistic constraints

practices_descriptions.title: C2 – Description of practices, policies and future initiatives

practicesDescriptions.label: Detailed descriptions
practicesDescriptions.extractionGuidance: Look for: detailed sustainability program descriptions

strategy.title: C1 – Strategy: Business Model and Sustainability

productsServices.label: Description of products and services
productsServices.extractionGuidance: Look for: product lines, service offerings, main business activities

markets.label: Description of markets
markets.extractionGuidance: Look for: B2B/B2C, geographic markets, customer segments, sales channels

businessRelationships.label: Description of business relationships
businessRelationships.extractionGuidance: Look for: key suppliers, major customers, distribution partners

strategySustainabilityElements.label: Sustainability strategy elements
strategySustainabilityElements.extractionGuidance: Look for: sustainability goals in strategy, ESG strategic priorities

totalEnergyConsumption.label: Total Energy Consumption (MWh)
totalEnergyConsumption.extractionGuidance: Look for: total energy use, energy consumption in megawatt hours

hasEnergyBreakdown.label: Has energy breakdown
hasEnergyBreakdown.extractionGuidance: Is energy split by renewable/non-renewable available?

electricityRenewable.label: Electricity renewable (MWh)
electricityRenewable.extractionGuidance: Look for: renewable electricity, green energy, solar/wind electricity purchased

electricityNonRenewable.label: Electricity non-renewable (MWh)
electricityNonRenewable.extractionGuidance: Look for: grid electricity, conventional electricity

selfGeneratedRenewable.label: Self-generated renewable (MWh)
selfGeneratedRenewable.extractionGuidance: Look for: on-site solar, on-site wind generation

selfGeneratedNonRenewable.label: Self-generated non-renewable (MWh)
selfGeneratedNonRenewable.extractionGuidance: Look for: on-site generators, diesel generation

fuelsNonRenewable.label: Fuels non-renewable (MWh)
fuelsNonRenewable.extractionGuidance: Look for: natural gas, diesel, petrol, heating oil consumption

currentScope1.label: Gross Scope 1 GHG Emissions (tCO2e)
currentScope1.extractionGuidance: Look for: direct emissions, Scope 1, on-site emissions, combustion emissions

currentScope2Location.label: Gross Scope 2 location-based (tCO2e)
currentScope2Location.extractionGuidance: Look for: indirect emissions from electricity, Scope 2 location-based

currentScope2Market.label: Gross Scope 2 market-based (tCO2e)
currentScope2Market.extractionGuidance: Look for: Scope 2 market-based, contractual emissions from electricity

currentScope3Emissions.label: Scope 3 emissions by category

options: 3. Fuel- and Energy-Related Activities (Not Included in Scope 1 or Scope 2)

currentScope3Emissions.extractionGuidance: Look for: Scope 3 emissions, value chain emissions, supply chain emissions, business travel, employee commuting, sold products

hasGHGTargets.label: Has GHG reduction targets
hasGHGTargets.extractionGuidance: Look for: emission reduction targets, net zero commitments, decarbonization goals

ghgTargetBaseYear.label: Target base year
ghgTargetBaseYear.extractionGuidance: Look for: baseline year, base year for targets

ghgTargetYear.label: Target year
ghgTargetYear.extractionGuidance: Look for: target year, goal year (e.g., 2030, 2050)

scope1BaseYear.label: Scope 1 base year emissions (tCO2e)
scope1BaseYear.extractionGuidance: Historical Scope 1 emissions in base year

scope1TargetYear.label: Scope 1 target year emissions (tCO2e)
scope1TargetYear.extractionGuidance: Target Scope 1 emissions for goal year

mainActionsForTargets.label: Main actions to achieve targets
mainActionsForTargets.extractionGuidance: Look for: action plans, reduction strategies, initiatives to meet targets

operatesHighImpactSectors.label: Operates in high climate impact sectors
operatesHighImpactSectors.extractionGuidance: Does company operate in energy-intensive or fossil fuel sectors?

transitionPlanStatus.label: Transition plan status
transitionPlanStatus.extractionGuidance: Look for: climate transition plan status

transitionPlanAdoptionDate.label: Transition plan adoption date
transitionPlanAdoptionDate.extractionGuidance: Planned date for transition plan adoption

transitionPlanDescription.label: Transition plan description
transitionPlanDescription.extractionGuidance: Look for: decarbonization roadmap, climate transition strategy

reportsPollution.label: Reports pollution to authorities
reportsPollution.extractionGuidance: Does company report emissions to environmental authorities?

pollutionData.label: Pollution data by pollutant

pollutant.description: Name of pollutant (e.g., NOx, SOx, PM10, VOCs)

pollutionData.extractionGuidance: Look for: air pollutants, water pollutants, hazardous substances, NOx, SOx, particulate matter

totalWaterWithdrawal.label: Total water withdrawal (m³)
totalWaterWithdrawal.extractionGuidance: Look for: water consumption, water use, water withdrawal

waterWithdrawalHighStress.label: Water withdrawal in high water-stress areas (m³)

hasWaterConsumingProcesses.label: Has water-consuming processes
hasWaterConsumingProcesses.extractionGuidance: Does company have significant water-consuming operations?

waterDischarge.label: Water discharge (m³)
waterDischarge.extractionGuidance: Look for: wastewater discharge, water returned

hasBiodiversitySites.label: Has sites in biodiversity-sensitive areas
hasBiodiversitySites.extractionGuidance: Look for: operations near protected areas, nature reserves, sensitive ecosystems

biodiversitySites.label: Biodiversity sites list
biodiversitySites.extractionGuidance: Sites near or in protected areas

totalSealedArea.label: Total sealed area
totalSealedArea.extractionGuidance: Look for: paved areas, built surfaces

totalNatureOnSite.extractionGuidance: Look for: green spaces, gardens, natural areas on-site

totalNatureOffSite.extractionGuidance: Look for: conservation areas managed off-site

circularEconomyDescription.label: Description of circular economy practices
circularEconomyDescription.extractionGuidance: Look for: recycling rates, reuse programs, design for circularity

wasteData.label: Waste data by type

wasteType.description: Type of waste (e.g., hazardous, non-hazardous, electronic, etc.)

wasteData.extractionGuidance: Look for: waste generation, recycling rates, landfill waste, hazardous waste

operatesSignificantMaterials.extractionGuidance: Does company use significant raw materials in operations?

materialsData.extractionGuidance: Look for: raw materials used, input materials, resource consumption

hasClimateRisks.extractionGuidance: Look for: climate risk assessment, physical risks, transition risks

climateHazardsDescription.extractionGuidance: Look for: flooding risks, extreme weather, heat stress, drought risks

hasClimateAdaptationActions.extractionGuidance: Look for: adaptation measures, resilience actions

femaleManagementEmployees.label: Female employees at management level

selfEmployedWorkers.extractionGuidance: Look for: independent contractors, freelancers working exclusively for company

additionalSocialDisclosures.extractionGuidance: Any other social or workforce information

calculatedFields.note: The following fields are automatically calculated and do not need to be extracted from documents

generalPrinciples: CRITICAL: ONLY extract data that is explicitly stated in the documents. NEVER infer, calculate, estimate, or guess values.
If data is not found, mark the field as 'NOT_FOUND' - do not leave blank or use placeholder values.
Always cite the exact source: filename, page number, section, and exact quote.
Provide confidence level: HIGH (exact match), MEDIUM (needs verification), LOW (uncertain).
If multiple conflicting values are found for the same field, flag for user review.
Validate extracted values against expected formats and ranges.
For numeric fields, ensure units match the schema specification.
For date fields, use YYYY-MM-DD format.
For boolean fields, look for clear affirmative or negative statements.
For arrays/lists, extract all relevant items.

outputFormat.structure: For each field, provide a JSON object with the following structure

example.quote: The reporting entity is Acme Corp, a private limited liability company.

priorityFields.description: Extract these fields first as they are required and frequently used in calculations
